programme.title: برايتون مقابل ليفربول - R16
programme.desc: استعد لكأس EFL بالضربة القاضية 2024/25، حيث تتنافس فرق من EFL والدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز بشدة على مكان مرغوب فيه في ملعب ويمبلي الشهير. قم بزيارة كأس كاراباو 2024/25 — مسابقة EFL بالضربة القاضية المثيرة حيث تتنافس أندية من EFL والدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز على مكان مرغوب فيه في النهائي في ملعب ويمبلي الشهير.

programme.title: واشنطن كوماندرز ضد ميامي دولفينز - اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي - الدوري الوطني لكرة القدم - 2025/26
programme.desc: تغطية حية وحصرية لـ NFL (الدوري الوطني لكرة القدم). يتكون اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي بشكل أساسي من موسم منتظم مدته 18 أسبوعًا، والذي يمتد في الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية من أوائل سبتمبر إلى أوائل يناير. يبلغ موسم اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي ذروته في السوبر بول، الذي لعب في أوائل فبراير

programme.title: المجر ضد جمهورية أيرلندا - التصفيات الأوروبية لكأس العالم 2026 - MD10
programme.desc: سيكون القسم الأوروبي من مسابقة تصفيات كأس العالم لكرة القدم 2026 بمثابة تصفيات لكأس العالم لكرة القدم 2026، التي ستقام في كندا والمكسيك والولايات المتحدة يتوفر ما مجموعه 16 مكانًا في البطولة النهائية لفرق الاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم.

programme.title: مجلة UCL للاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم 2025/2026 - معاينة MD5
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.title: المغرب .. بطل كأس العالم تحت 20 سنة
programme.desc: توج المغرب مسيرة تاريخية في تشيلي في أكتوبر 2025، بفوزه على الأرجنتين 2-0 لاستعادة الكأس في كأس العالم تحت 20 سنة. وكانت النتيجة أول فوز لكأس العالم للمغرب على أي مستوى من الفئات العمرية في تاريخ البلاد. شاهد أفضل لحظات هذا الإنجاز حصريًا على beIN SPORTS.

programme.title: آخر "دانتي" (الحلقة رقم1)
programme.desc: في سن 42 عاما، لاعبو نيس البرازيليون، دانتي، يلعبون موسمه الأخير من مسيرته. في موسمه الأخير كمحترف، يفتح الباب لمتابعته وتذكر أفضل لحظاته

programme.title: واشنطن كوماندرز ضد ميامي دولفينز - اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي - الدوري الوطني لكرة القدم - 2025/26
programme.desc: تغطية حية وحصرية لـ NFL (الدوري الوطني لكرة القدم). يتكون اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي بشكل أساسي من موسم منتظم مدته 18 أسبوعًا، والذي يمتد في الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية من أوائل سبتمبر إلى أوائل يناير. يبلغ موسم اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي ذروته في السوبر بول، الذي لعب في أوائل فبراير

programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. Paris Saint-Germain are the defending champions. programme.title: Salzburg vs Go Ahead Eagles - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

Felix AUGER-ALIASSIME (CAN) vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) - Final - Rolex Paris Masters - Paris - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Rolex Paris Masters will be held from 27 October to 2 November at the new Paris La Défense Arena. Now in its 54th edition, this ATP Masters 1000 tournament features the world’s top players battling on indoor hard courts in both singles and doubles draws. With total prize money of €6,128,940, the event serves as the final major stop before the ATP Finals, promising a thrilling conclusion to the tennis season.

programme.title: Wolfsburg vs Manchester United - UEFA Women’s Champions League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025/2026 UEFA Women's Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. The teams are competing for a place in the final that will be played at the Ullevaal Stadion in Oslo, Norway on May 2026. Barcelona are the current Champions.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night - 34
programme.desc: ONE Fight Night 34 World-class martial arts action returns as Regian Eersel defends his Lightweight Muay Thai World Title against rising British challenger George Jarvis. A stacked card features elite bouts in MMA and Muay Thai across multiple weight classes, including fan favorites Garry Tonon, Supergirl, and Kang Ji Won. Non-stop combat live from the iconic Lumpinee Boxing Stadium.

programme.title: Panenka: Game Changer | E1
programme.desc: A documentary about Antonin Panenka, the man who invented a new way of taking penalties.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night - 35
programme.desc: History will be made when ONE Championship returns to the world-famous Lumpinee Stadium for ONE Fight Night 35: Buntan vs. Hemetsberger, which broadcasts live in U.S. primetime on Friday, September 5. In the main event, a new ONE Women’s Strawweight Muay Thai World Champion will be crowned. Filipino-American superstar Jackie Buntan already holds the ONE Women’s Strawweight Kickboxing World Title, and now, she’ll have a chance to become the third two-sport queen in ONE Championship history. But Austrian dynamo Stella Hemetsberger wants to keep her momentum rolling in Bangkok, earn the biggest win of her career, and claim the richest prize in the sport. Plus, ONE Welterweight Submission Grappl

programme.title: Marc Márquez: More than a Comeback
programme.desc: After 2,184 days, 108 crashes, six surgeries and 30 missed Grands Prix, Marc Marquez has once again claimed the MotoGP World Championship title, doing so for an astonishing seventh time. But it’s been more than a comeback for the Spanish rider, who has endured his own personal calvary over the past six years. Through exclusive interviews with Marc, his friends and family, and never-before-seen footage, this 30-minute documentary provides previously unheard perspectives on the highs and lows of the Spaniard’s arduous journey back to the top of Grand Prix motorcycle racing

programme.title: One Friday Fight -129
programme.desc: ONE Friday Fights 129 lights up Bangkok on Oct 17 with 12 bouts across Muay Thai, MMA, and kickboxing. Expect fireworks in the headliner as Thailand’s Tengnueng collides with Myanmar’s Tun Min Aung in a KO-hungry showdown. Plus, standout clashes: Petlampun vs Ayad Albadr, and 19-year-old Fergus Smith vs Zahran Al-Wesabi. Live from Lumpinee Boxing Stadium, its elbows, knees, and spinning kicks all night in a stacked showcase. Prelims spotlight rising prospects; main card promises fast finishes.

programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Saint-Raphaël vs Nîmes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.desc: Sport, Sport, Biography. Explore l'aspect mental du sport, devoilant comment les meilleurs athletes reflechissent, s'adaptent et surmontent leurs adversaires sous une pression intense.

programme.title: Gardien Ou Rien Du Tout - Football - Documentaire
programme.desc: Sport, Sport, Football. Plongez au cœur de l'univers unique, intense et souvent solitaire des gardiens de but, ou chaque decision compte et chaque instant devient un combat.

programme.title: Phoenix Mercury Suns vs Portland Blazers - NBA - Basketball 2025-2026
programme.desc: Sport, Basketball. Plus grande ligue professionnelle de basket-ball au monde, la NBA offre une competition d'elite entre 30 equipes. La saison atteint son apogee lors des Finales NBA, ou les meilleures franchises s'affrontent pour le titre de champion.

programme.title: NFL Extra -
programme.desc: Sport, Sport magazine, Basketball. Chaque semaine, l'emission propose des interviews exclusives, des reportages en coulisses, les temps forts des matchs et des analyses approfondies pour les passionnes de la NFL.

programme.title: Ep 12 Inside Fra - This is Paris - Football 2025-2026
programme.desc: Sport, Football, Sport. Suivez de pres le parcours du Paris Saint-Germain avec une couverture complete des dernieres infos, des resultats et des prochains rendez-vous, alors que le club emblematique continue de marquer l'histoire de la Ligue 1 depuis 1974.

programme.title: Entente vs Bordeaux-Bgles - Coupe de France Hommes - Football 2025-2026

programme.title: Juventus vs Lyon - UEFA Women’s Champions League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025/2026 UEFA Women's Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. The teams are competing for a place in the final that will be played at the Ullevaal Stadion in Oslo, Norway on May 2026. Barcelona are the current Champions.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Paris FC - UEFA Women’s Champions League 2025/2026 - MD3
programme.desc: The 2025/2026 UEFA Women's Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. The teams are competing for a place in the final that will be played at the Ullevaal Stadion in Oslo, Norway on May 2026. Barcelona are the current Champions.

programme.title: CAF Awards 2025
programme.desc: The Confédération Africaine de Football (CAF) has unveiled the Top Three Nominees in each of the Men’s Categories of the highly anticipated CAF Awards 2025. The prestigious event will be held in Rabat, Morocco, on 19 November 2025, celebrating the exceptional performances and achievements that have defined African football this year. Leading the charge for the Player of the Year Top prize are Mohamed Salah (Egypt/Liverpool), Achraf Hakimi (Morocco/Paris Saint-Germain) and Victor Osimhen (Nigeria/Galatasaray), three of the continent’s brightest stars who have showcased their talents at the highest level.

programme.title: مجلة UCL للاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم 2025/2026 - معاينة MD5
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.title: Switzerland vs Rep of Ireland - FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.title: مجلة UCL للاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم 2025/2026 - معاينة MD5
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.title: المغرب .. بطل كأس العالم تحت 20 سنة
programme.desc: توج المغرب مسيرة تاريخية في تشيلي في أكتوبر 2025، بفوزه على الأرجنتين 2-0 لاستعادة الكأس في كأس العالم تحت 20 سنة. وكانت النتيجة أول فوز لكأس العالم للمغرب على أي مستوى من الفئات العمرية في تاريخ البلاد. شاهد أفضل لحظات هذا الإنجاز حصريًا على beIN SPORTS.

programme.title: Vålerenga vs St. Pölten - UEFA Women’s Champions League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025/2026 UEFA Women's Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. programme.title: Brazil vs France - FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

Gemma TRIAY PONS ESP Delfina BREA SENESI ARG vs Ariana SANCHEZ FALLADA ESP Paula JOSEMARIA MARTIN ES
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

Rayo Vallecano vs Lech Poznań - UEFA Conference League 2025/2026 - MD3
programme.desc: The UEFA Conference League is the third-tier club football tournament organised by UEFA. The new format competition runs for its second season live and exclusive only on beIN. The RB Arena in Leipzig, Germany, is the venue for the Conference League final on 27 May 2026.

programme.title: Ajax vs Galatasaray - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. Paris Saint-Germain are the defending champions. The 2025/26 UEFA Champions League will be the second to be played under the new 36-team league phase. The final will be played on 30 May 2026 at Puskás Aréna in Budapest, Hungary.

programme.title: Salzburg vs Go Ahead Eagles - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Wolfsburg vs Manchester United - UEFA Women’s Champions League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025/2026 UEFA Women's Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. The teams are competing for a place in the final that will be played at the Ullevaal Stadion in Oslo, Norway on May 2026. Barcelona are the current Champions.

programme.title: Paris FC vs. Benfica - UEFA Women’s Champions League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025/2026 UEFA Women's Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. The teams are competing for a place in the final that will be played at the Ullevaal Stadion in Oslo, Norway on May 2026. Barcelona are the current Champions.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night - 34
programme.desc: ONE Fight Night 34 World-class martial arts action returns as Regian Eersel defends his Lightweight Muay Thai World Title against rising British challenger George Jarvis. A stacked card features elite bouts in MMA and Muay Thai across multiple weight classes, including fan favorites Garry Tonon, Supergirl, and Kang Ji Won. Non-stop combat live from the iconic Lumpinee Boxing Stadium.

programme.title: Panenka: Game Changer | E1
programme.desc: A documentary about Antonin Panenka, the man who invented a new way of taking penalties.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night - 35
programme.desc: History will be made when ONE Championship returns to the world-famous Lumpinee Stadium for ONE Fight Night 35: Buntan vs. Hemetsberger, which broadcasts live in U.S. primetime on Friday, September 5. In the main event, a new ONE Women’s Strawweight Muay Thai World Champion will be crowned. Filipino-American superstar Jackie Buntan already holds the ONE Women’s Strawweight Kickboxing World Title, and now, she’ll have a chance to become the third two-sport queen in ONE Championship history. But Austrian dynamo Stella Hemetsberger wants to keep her momentum rolling in Bangkok, earn the biggest win of her career, and claim the richest prize in the sport. Plus, ONE Welterweight Submission Grappl

programme.title: Marc Márquez: More than a Comeback
programme.desc: After 2,184 days, 108 crashes, six surgeries and 30 missed Grands Prix, Marc Marquez has once again claimed the MotoGP World Championship title, doing so for an astonishing seventh time. But it’s been more than a comeback for the Spanish rider, who has endured his own personal calvary over the past six years. Through exclusive interviews with Marc, his friends and family, and never-before-seen footage, this 30-minute documentary provides previously unheard perspectives on the highs and lows of the Spaniard’s arduous journey back to the top of Grand Prix motorcycle racing

programme.title: One Friday Fight -129
programme.desc: ONE Friday Fights 129 lights up Bangkok on Oct 17 with 12 bouts across Muay Thai, MMA, and kickboxing. Expect fireworks in the headliner as Thailand’s Tengnueng collides with Myanmar’s Tun Min Aung in a KO-hungry showdown. Plus, standout clashes: Petlampun vs Ayad Albadr, and 19-year-old Fergus Smith vs Zahran Al-Wesabi. Live from Lumpinee Boxing Stadium, its elbows, knees, and spinning kicks all night in a stacked showcase. Prelims spotlight rising prospects; main card promises fast finishes.

programme.title: Um Salal vs Al Sadd - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W7
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Saint-Raphaël vs Nîmes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Uganda vs Burkina Faso - FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.title: Juventus vs Lyon - UEFA Women’s Champions League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025/2026 UEFA Women's Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. The teams are competing for a place in the final that will be played at the Ullevaal Stadion in Oslo, Norway on May 2026. Barcelona are the current Champions.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Paris FC - UEFA Women’s Champions League 2025/2026 - MD3
programme.desc: The 2025/2026 UEFA Women's Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. The teams are competing for a place in the final that will be played at the Ullevaal Stadion in Oslo, Norway on May 2026. Barcelona are the current Champions.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: CAF Awards 2025
programme.desc: The Confédération Africaine de Football (CAF) has unveiled the Top Three Nominees in each of the Men’s Categories of the highly anticipated CAF Awards 2025. The prestigious event will be held in Rabat, Morocco, on 19 November 2025, celebrating the exceptional performances and achievements that have defined African football this year. Leading the charge for the Player of the Year Top prize are Mohamed Salah (Egypt/Liverpool), Achraf Hakimi (Morocco/Paris Saint-Germain) and Victor Osimhen (Nigeria/Galatasaray), three of the continent’s brightest stars who have showcased their talents at the highest level.

programme.title: مجلة UCL للاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم 2025/2026 - معاينة MD5
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.title: Switzerland vs Rep of Ireland - FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.desc: A 26-minute programme in which nine LALIGA legends are invited to choose their ideal eleven. Each episode features a different legend, who is invited to design a line-up following different indications; the best opponents they faced, the best players from LALIGA EA SPORTS 23/24 and the best teammates they played with.Nine LaLiga legends are invited to choose their ideal eleven.
